Fortune.title: 2019 OVERVIEW
Fortune.content: Family, close friends and colleagues, and those who are your nearest and dearest, play important roles of support and encouragement this year. So, it’s important to choose carefully whom you associate with.

Fortune.title: LOVE
Fortune.content: When you meet or are with someone, who fits your love-list, and you are open to make compromises to meet them halfway, then that’s when you know love is right. When love is true, you’ll be prepared to overlook their character quirks.

Fortune.title: CAREER
Fortune.content: You are a highly creative person, and whatever you decide to put your talents and focus on during this time can be successful and rewarding.

Fortune.title: MONEY
Fortune.content: Sudden changes can alter your plans. If you need to make quick decisions to boost your financial security, then do so, but be sure to get the facts right before you do anything.

Fortune.title: SPIRIT
Fortune.content: Love is the universal language, but it can mean different things in different cultures. Be open to embrace and accept what others do, without judgment.
